E

EdgesEightEquals - Class in org.projectsw.Model.CommonGoal
The EdgesEightEquals class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have either four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf (strategyCode = 8) or at least eight tiles of the same type on the bookshelf (strategyCode = 9).
EdgesEightEquals(Integer) - Constructor for class org.projectsw.Model.CommonGoal.EdgesEightEquals
Creates a new instance of the EdgesEightEquals class using the unique code of the CommonGoal.
